games.title: Master Chess
games.description: Sharpen your tactics to defeat the king in this classic game. Compete online with either the AI or players from around the world. Aim for victory!
games.howToPlayText:
On desktop: click the piece you want to move and then click the square on the board where you want to positionate the piece.

On mobile: tap the piece you want to move and then tap the square on the board where you want to positionate the piece.

games.title: English Checkers Online Multiplayer
games.howToPlayText:
**How to Play English Checkers**

English Checkers is a strategic board game where players aim to capture their opponent‚Äôs checkers or block them completely. Here‚Äôs how to get started and understand the basic rules:

**Game Objective**
The goal is to either capture all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers or completely block them so they can‚Äôt make any legal moves.

**Types of Checkers**
- **Simple checker:** moves diagonally forward one square and can only capture forward.
- **King:** can move diagonally both forward and backward on any free square and can capture in both directions. When a simple checker reaches the last row, it becomes a king and gains these additional abilities.

**Basic Movement and Capture Rules**
1. **Movement:**
- simple checkers move diagonally forward one square at a time;
- kings can move diagonally in any direction on any free square.

2. **Capture:**
- if your checker is next to your opponent‚Äôs checker and there‚Äôs an empty square behind it, you must jump over the opponent‚Äôs checker and land in the empty square, capturing the opponent‚Äôs piece;
- captures are mandatory ‚Äî if you have the option to capture, you must do so;
- if a capture leads to another possible capture, you must continue capturing as part of the same turn until no more captures are possible;
- when a simple checker reaches the last row during a capture, it becomes a king but cannot make further moves in the same turn.

3. **Choosing Capture Options:**
- if there are multiple capture options available, you can choose which one to make;
- the ¬´Turkish strike¬ª rule means that a checker that has been beaten but not yet removed from the board can block the path of a king or another checker.

**Winning the Game**
You win the game by:
- capturing all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers;
- blocking your opponent so that they have no legal moves left.

**Getting Started in English Checkers Online Multiplayer**
1. **Choose your game mode:** play against the computer, compete online with real players, or play with a friend on the same screen.
2. **Select your difficulty level or opponent:** if playing against the computer, choose from 10 difficulty levels; if playing online, find a real opponent.
3. **Choose your side:** select whether you want to play as black or white.
4. **Start playing:** follow the rules of movement and capture to outmanoeuvre your opponent and achieve victory.

Enjoy the game and sharpen your strategic skills with English Checkers Online Multiplayer!

games.title: Zombie Space Episode II
games.description:
NEW ISSUE OF GALACTIC NEWS

ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE ON THE RED PLANET...
- Zombie virus has spread among civilians.
- Rescuers found survivors among the zombies.
- The galactic government has urgently gone on vacation.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
A zombie virus outbreak has occurred on the space station. The first group of mercenaries disappeared. Your task is to find survivors among the zombies and find out the cause of the zombie apocalypse. You have to fight a horde of zombies using various types of weapons. Look for hidden weapons in chests. Upgrade characters and weapons! Use the abilities of the characters in hot battles against zombies. Play with a friend on the same device or solo!
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

games.title: Ragdoll Soccer
games.description: Enter the thrilling world of Ragdoll Soccer, where you command a stick figure footballer in exciting games. Aim to outscore rivals and become a champion, whether playing alone or with a friend, offering nonstop enjoyment on your phone or computer.
games.howToPlayText:
Play football with a stickman! A fun 2D sports game for one or two players!
Control the stickman like a doll and hit the ball to score a goal against the opponent.

Features of the game:
 - single player mode
- local multiplayer for two players
 - Championship mode
 - The game has boosters and abilities!
 - penalty shootout mode

To play with a PC, you can use:
- keyboard (WASD +QE)
- mouse
- gamepad
To play from your phone, use touch input

games.title: Ludo Legend
games.description: Play a game of Ludo! Everyone's favorite board game! Play alone or with your friends on one device! Just pass it on! Colorful design and easy mechanics will keep you playing for hours!
games.howToPlayText: Get your tokens from start to finish with rolls of a die. First, release them on the roll of 6. Roll a die and decide which token you move. Get all of them into a safehouse first and you win! But watch out, your opponents can kick your token back to their starting position when they land on the spot with one of your tokens!

Discover power-ups, find the secret exit, and face challenging bosses, all while enjoying an engaging solo or multiplayer adventure on your devices.

games.title: Master Checkers
games.description: Play Checkers, the classic two-player board game! Make diagonal moves, eliminate opponents, and crown your piece as a king. Challenge the computer, a local player, or opponents worldwide in this exciting Italian Checkers version!
games.howToPlayText:
Moves are only allowed on dark squares, so pieces always move diagonally. Single pieces are always restricted to moving forward (towards the opponent).
Capture pieces by jumping.
A piece that makes a capture (jump) jumps over one of the opponent's pieces and lands in a straight diagonal line on the other side. Only one piece can be captured in one jump; however, multiple jumps are allowed in one move.
Jumps (or captures) are mandatory.
If a player can make a capture, the jump must be made.

When a piece reaches the furthest row from the player who controls it, it becomes a king and can move either forward or backward.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/master-checkers-25e9-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Backgammon
games.description: Discover the captivating game of Backgammon, where strategy and skill are key. Navigate your pieces to eliminate them before your rival does. Enjoy playing this timeless game online for free on your device, and strive to become a Backgammon champion!
games.howToPlayText:
Roll the dice and move your piece.
The winner is the one who removes all of his chips from the board before the opponent.
Be careful! It's not just luck. In the long term, strategy plays a more important role.

games.title: Stealth robbery of a house together
games.description:
Stealth robbery of a house together: steal things, hide from the guards, take the loot to the van. Play with a friend on the same device.

Play alone or with a friend on the same device. Your task is to take out as much furniture and valuables as possible from the house without being caught by security!

The house is carefully guarded: guards are patrolling, and if you get in their line of sight, run! Use the abilities

The goal of the game
is to collect items from the house and take them to the van to complete the progress bar and complete the level! The more valuable the items are, the faster the scale increases.
games.howToPlayText:
Stealth robbery of a house together: steal things, hide from the guards, take the loot to the van. Play with a friend on the same device.

Play alone or with a friend on the same device. Your task is to take out as much furniture and valuables as possible from the house without being caught by security!

The house is carefully guarded: guards are patrolling, and if you get in their line of sight, run! Use the abilities

The goal of the game
is to collect items from the house and take them to the van to complete the progress bar and complete the level! The more valuable the items are, the faster the scale increases.

On PC:
Player 1: Move with W, A, S, D
Player 2: Move with Arrow Keys

On the phone:
Single player - move your finger on the screen
Left player ‚Äî move your finger on the left side of the screen
Right player ‚Äî move your finger on the right side of the screen

games.title: Stickman Miners Wars
games.description: Lead your stickman king to victory in Stickman Miners Wars, where strategic decision-making is key. Command an army of miners and warriors to build your forces and triumph over opponents. Upgrade your units and yourself as you gain experience, and strategically attack enemy castles while defending your own. Will your strategy lead you to dominance? Play Stickman Miners Wars now!
games.howToPlayText:
First, you need to choose the first region you want to reclaim on the global map and press the PLAY button.

After this, you will enter the level and can play as the Stickman King. To move, use the keyboard keys (arrow keys or WASD) or a joystick or mouse.

To start, go to the miner purchase zone and buy a few miners. They will begin mining gold for you, and you can mine gold alongside them. Once you have accumulated enough gold, go to the warrior purchase zone to build your army.

To send your army into attack, click the sword icon on the right or press the E key. Your goal is to first destroy the opponent‚Äôs towers and then their castle.

But be careful, as the opponent aims to do the same to your castle.

Controls:

WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click = move
Left-click = interact with the in-game buttons

games.title: Cowboys Duel
games.description: Enter the rugged world of the Wild West in *Cowboys Duel*, where sharp aim and quick reflexes are crucial. Compete in solo missions or face off against friends in thrilling duels. Customize your character, enjoy various game modes, and hone your skills to become the top cowboy.
games.howToPlayText:
- Click on the menu and open the game

- Just Click when you want to shoot

- Watch the clock and shoot when it is 12, if you shoot before you will lose

- Click on the arrows before time runs out to turn them in the direction shown

- Download 20 Targets before time runs out

- The one who scores 3 wins.
